meta.article_title: May 31, 2021 - How to Play the Attacker/Blocker with Dead Rubber

dead_rubber_attacker_blocker.probleme: Playing against an attacker/blocker with a dead surface
causes_communes: Opponent's slow inverted surface or short pips

debutant.probleme: Get used to the dead surface
debutant.solution: Rally against it early in the match as much as you can

debutant.probleme: Adjust racket angles and stroke direction
debutant.solution: Aim higher against the deader incoming surface

intermediaire.probleme: Use spin to counteract the opponent's dead surface
intermediaire.solution: Put a good topspin or backspin on the ball

exercices_complementaires.description: Rally as much as you can to get used to it

metriques_progression.rep: Relentless attack of their weaker loops

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Over-angling the ball, leading to errors off the end
